invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for FSL-ANAT - Anatomical Processing Pipeline

gear.author: Analysis Group, FMRIB, Oxford, UK.

Image.description: T1-weighted, T2-weighted, or Proton-Density-weighted anatomical NIfTI file

gear.description:
This tool provides a general pipeline for processing anatomical images (e.g. T1-weighted scans).
Most of the pipeline involves standard use of FSL tools, but the bias-field correction has been substantially improved, especially for strong bias-fields typical of multi-coil arrays and high-field scanners.
The stages in the pipeline (in order) are:
reorient the images to the standard (MNI) orientation [fslreorient2std] automatically crop the image [robustfov] bias-field correction (RF/B1-inhomogeneity-correction) [FAST] registration to standard space (linear and non-linear) [FLIRT and FNIRT] brain-extraction [FNIRT-based or BET] tissue-type segmentation [FAST] subcortical structure segmentation [FIRST]
The overall run-time is heavily dependent on the resolution of the image but anything between 30 and 90 minutes would be typical. Outputs include a zipped archive and output file manifest.
gear.label: FSL-ANAT - Anatomical Processing Pipeline
gear.name: fsl-anat
gear.cite: M.W. Woolrich, S. Jbabdi, B. Patenaude, M. Chappell, S. Makni, T. Behrens, C. Beckmann, M. Jenkinson, S.M. Smith. Bayesian analysis of neuroimaging data in FSL. NeuroImage, 45:S173-86, 2009.

nobias.description: Turn off steps that do bias field correction (via FAST).

nosearch.description: Specify that linear registration uses the -nosearch option (FLIRT).

weakbias.description: Used for images with little and/or smooth bias fields.

clobber.description: If .anat directory exist (as specified by -o or default from -i) then delete it and make a new one.

noreorient.description: Turn off step that does reorientation 2 standard (fslreorient2std).

nocrop.description: Turn off step that does automated cropping (robustfov).

nosubcortseg.description: Turn off step that does sub-cortical segmentation (FIRST).

noreg.description: Turn off steps that do registration to standard (FLIRT and FNIRT).

s.description: Specify the value for bias field smoothing (the -l option in FAST).

t.description: Specify the type of image (choose one of T1 T2 PD - default is T1).

nononlinreg.description: Turn off step that does non-linear registration (FNIRT).

noseg.description: Turn off step that does tissue-type segmentation (FAST).

betfparam.description: Specify f parameter for BET (only used if not running non-linear reg and also wanting brain extraction done).
